'''Wakamatsu''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in {{Location|Chenyu Vale}}.
<!-- Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player AMOUNT_AS_WORD [[Item]]. -->

==Location==
Wakamatsu can be found sitting by the roadside east of the [[Mt. Lingmeng]] teleport waypoint. After completing the {{Quest|Shrouded Vale, Hidden Hero}}, he will move to outside [[Wangshan Hall]], sitting beside [[Wen the Fourth]].

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
''Available before completing ''Shrouded Vale, Hidden Hero''.''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Wakamatsu:''' It seems this is as far as I go...
:{{DIcon}} Are you alright?
::'''Wakamatsu:''' I... I... I crossed the seas, evading the intercepting Shogunate Dogs, crossed light-years and seas of stars... only to be defeated by this mountain...
::{{DIcon}} You sure you're not exaggerating...
::'''Wakamatsu:''' Master Zhenyu, I did not realize that the road to the shrine of martial skill was to be so arduous...
:{{DIcon}} Good luck. See ya.
::'''Wakamatsu:''' How... mortifying...
{{Dialogue End}}
